name: PokerBlocks
description:
The game is based on poker hands.

Blocks falls with card values and you must create combination to remove them from play.

Valid combination will include

pair (two identic value from any color) (lowest value)

three of a kind (three identic value from any color) (low value)

four of a kind (four identic value from any color) (second highest value))

straight (card whose value follow exemple, 2-3-4-5-6 or A-K-Q-J-10 in any order)(highest value)

Flush (five cards from the same color) (low value by itselt but can be combined with straight for greatest value)

The cards can be read vertically or horizontally or both(see menu).

You can choose to play with only one set of card (52 in total) in which case you loose once you don't have any card left.

Flush being very easy to obtain, you can deactivate it in the settings.

You can chose the size of the arena and the falling blocks(1 to 5 + random).

You can set the initial speed and the number of points to win.

Infinite mode has no goal to reach but you can keep your five best scores.

If there is space underneath blocks will fall.

Control are

A or Q or Left arrow to move left

E or D or right arrow to move right

S or Down to drop the blocks faster

Space to rotate the blocks

P or Escape to pause the game.
